llm_res.rule: Returns the symbol of the token. E.g. "HIX". OPTIONAL - This method can be used to improve usability, but interfaces and other contracts MUST NOT expect these values to be present.
Returns the amount which _spender is still allowed to withdraw from _owner.
The function SHOULD throw unless the _from account has deliberately authorized the sender of the message via some mechanism.
Returns the name of the token - e.g. "MyToken". OPTIONAL - This method can be used to improve usability, but interfaces and other contracts MUST NOT expect these values to be present.
